page.title: 18Churches in Roehampton Area
page.content: Most churchgoers are Roman Catholics whorshipping at St. Joseph's, Roehampton Lane; at daily service or in quiet prayer there. At Parkside there is also a chapel holding regular sevices at the residence of the Papal Nuncio (the Roman Catholic Pope's ambassador to this country). St.Paul's in Inner Park Rd. and Holy Trinity in Ponsonby Rd. are 2 Church of England churches serving socially mixed areas aiming to make all people welcome. Holy Trinity is linked to the Methodist Church in Minstead Gardens and the two congregations work together as an Ecumenical Parish sharing their resources. Holy Trinity is a typical old building whereas the Methodist Church is modern and on weekdays used as a hall for community projects such as mother and baby, and youth groups. Holy Trinity is linked to the school.
